meaningMnemonic: You have 時代 as a "period" of time you're talking about. What period? The <kanji>infancy</kanji> <kanji>year</kanji>s. Those years are not just when you're a baby, but when you were growing up, too. That was your <vocabulary>childhood</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
